channel.title: RSCA Downtime bugs (crashes, dupes etc)
channel.description:
anyone care to list as much info as they can on how to cause some damage to RSCA servers? and if theres any server admins out there who have recorded stack traces from their servers crashing, please share.
pompano has listed 2 which i have fixed, really would like to get this moparscape classic server off to a smooth start.
